title: Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier, 1 gallon, Black; low tank indicator; Dish washer safe; Humidity capacity: 142ml/h; Aroma tray; 3 speeds; mechanical knob; covers 320 sq. ft. area, weight: 6.33 lbs
descriptions:
Mainstays 1-Gallon Cool Mist Humidifier – Black

Add comfortable moisture to dry rooms with this evaporative cool-mist humidifier. The removable 1-gallon tank is dishwasher safe for easy cleaning, and a low-tank indicator with auto shut-off helps save energy. Delivers up to 142 ml/h of moisture and covers up to 320 sq ft—great for bedrooms, offices, or living areas. Customize comfort with 3 speed settings via a simple mechanical knob. Includes an aroma tray for optional fragrance. Compatible with BestAir H62 replacement filter. Lightweight design at 6.33 lbs.

Key features:
- Evaporative cool mist; humidity output 142 ml/h
- 1-gallon removable, dishwasher-safe tank
- Low tank indicator and empty-tank protection (auto shut-off)
- Covers up to 320 sq ft
- 3 speeds; adjustable mechanical knob
- Aroma tray
- Compatible with BestAir H62 filter
- Lightweight: 6.33 lbs.

Title: Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier, 1 gallon, Black; low tank indicator; Dish washer safe; Humidity capacity: 142ml/h; Aroma tray; 3 speeds; mechanical knob; covers 320 sq. ft. area, weight: 6.33 lbs

Description: Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier

The Mainstays black, 1-gallon, cool-mist humidifier uses evaporative technology to add moisture to dry rooms that have low relative humidity levels. The Mainstays black, cool-mist humidifier has a one-gallon water tank that is easy to remove for filling and is dishwasher safe for easy cleaning! The Mainstays black, 1-gallon, cool-mist humidifier is equipped with a low tank indicator with auto shut off and helps save energy when the tank is empty. Humidifiers offer many benefits to your environment, making your home a more comfortable and enjoyable place throughout the year. Consistent moisture helps to protect wood floors and furniture, and indoor plants. Reduced static electricity benefitting people, computers, and home electronics. The Mainstays black, 1-gallon, cool-mist humidifier adds moisture to the air, which makes the air feel warmer! – Now you could keep your thermostat lower while still feeling warm and comfortable during the winter months!

    Replacement Filter: Compatible with BestAir H62
    Dish washer safe
    Humidity capacity: 142ml/h
    Easy to clean
    Aroma tray available
    Empty tank protection
    Large area coverage: humidifies areas up to 320 sq. ft.
    3 speed settings -Adjustable Mechanical knob
    Evaporative technology: adds moisture to any room
    Lightweight: only 6.33 lbs
